titles.title: HP35 Glory, love, and praise, and honour

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glory, love, and praise, and honour,
For our food
Now bestowed
Render we the Donor.
Bounteous God, we now confess thee,
God, who thus
Blessest us,
Meet it is to bless thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Knows the ox his master's stable,
And shall we
Not know thee,
Nourished at thy table?
Yes, of all good gifts the Giver
Thee we own,
Thee alone
Magnify for ever.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thankful for our every blessing,
Let us sing
Christ the Spring,
Never, never ceasing.
Source of all our gifts and graces
Christ we own,
Christ alone
Calls for all our praises.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He dispels our sin and sadness,
Life imparts,
Cheers our hearts,
Fills with food and gladness.
Who himself for all has given,
Us he feeds,
Us he leads
To a feast in heaven.
